Ed Fialkowski

Full Stack Web Developer

I enjoy building everything from landing pages to rich interactive web apps. I have a diverse set of skills on both back-end and front-end. I'm fluent in working with API's, Responsive Design, OOP, design structures, Agile development, page speed, and working remotely. With the right design, I can make anything.
